Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product available for sale in the Arus POS system.

sku.description: Stock keeping unit of the product

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer in the Arus POS CRM.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a sales transaction in the Arus POS system.

date.description: Date and time of the transaction.

paymentMethod.description: Payment method used for the transaction (e.g., cash, credit card).

isPaid.description: Indicates if a debt transaction has been paid. Defaults to true for non-debt transactions.

paidAt.description: The timestamp when a debt was marked as paid.

debtNoteImageUrl.description: URL for the uploaded image of the initial debt note.

paymentNoteImageUrl.description: URL for the uploaded image of the payment proof.

TransactionItem.title: TransactionItem
TransactionItem.description: Represents an item within a transaction.

id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction item.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the transaction.

price.description: Price of the product at the time of the transaction.

Inventory.title: Inventory
Inventory.description: Represents the inventory levels of a product.

id.description: Unique identifier for the inventory entry.

quantity.description: Current quantity of the product in inventory.

lastUpdated.description: Date and time the inventory was last updated.

UserPermissions.title: UserPermissions
UserPermissions.description: Represents a user's system wide permission settings for Arus POS system.  The authentication data itself is NOT stored.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserPermissions entry.

canEditSettings.description: Flag indicating whether the user has permissions to edit settings.
